tab1.app_text:
This is your first login to the app.
To begin your setup process, press *Next*.
tab1.crypto_text:
This is your first time in the app.
To continue with the onboarding, press 'Next'.

tab2.app_text:
What sets MoneyStats apart from other money management apps is that you don’t need to track every daily expense.
Simply input *Stats* once a week or, preferably, once a month to get the most out of the features.
tab2.crypto_text: Create or import your crypto wallet, add your assets by completing the form, and get details, stats, and much more.

tab3.app_text:
Almost all features of the app are interactive.
After entering the Dashboard, start by creating a new Wallet.
Once you’ve added new *Stats*, you can view graphs and tables with all the details.
tab3.crypto_text: Manage holding or trading operations in the transactions section.

tab4.app_text: It’s time to get started! Press *Try Now* to access the Dashboard and discover all the features.
tab4.crypto_text: Press 'Try Now' to access the dashboard.

login.title: Log In
login.subtitle: Fill the form to log in

warning.password:
Warning: Your password must meet the following criteria:

  • Must be 8 to 10 characters long.
  • Must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
  • Must include at least one number and one special character from the following: @$!%*?&.,
To ensure the security of your account, make sure your password meets these criteria. A strong password is essential to protect your personal data and online privacy.

infoApp.title: Info Registration
infoApp.text:
To register for the MoneyStats application, you require an Invitation Code. If you don't have the code, you can request it from Giovanni in the Contact section. In the meantime, you can explore the application using the following credentials:
• Username: moneystats
• Password: moneystats
This account provides you with a preview of the app's interface. Please note that you won't be able to modify or add new data.

reportBug.title: Report a Bug
reportBug.titleBugSub: Write a short title about the bug
reportBug.subTitle: Tell us more about the problem
reportBug.text: Write what you were doing before the error.

data.changelog:
· Service Migration on Oracle Cloud.
· Bug Fixed.

· Added new Crypto Section
· Updated Add and Edit Wallets

· Improved loading performance through caching.
· Enhanced account functionality, auto-refresh token, now the session lasts more than an hour.
· Fixed an issue on Edit Wallet that set all wallets as Crypto.
· Fixed Wallet details tradingview data.

· Fixed error on Add Stats with 0 balance.
· Fixed Error Handler.
· Fixed error Add Crypto Stats if wallet does not have asset.

· Fixed cache issue on live wallets.
· Improved performance.
· Enhanced security.
· Fixed Crypto resume section when data is missing.
· Added validation rules for email and password, and improved the authentication screen.

closeOperation.title: Close Operation
closeOperation.subTitle: You are about to close the current trading operation. Check and confirm the exit price and quantity. If there's any discrepancy or if you wish to make changes, click 'Edit'. Once you're satisfied, proceed with the closure.

operation.title: Add Operation
operation.subTitle: Add a new operation, invest some FIAT money, open a new Holding position or open a new Trading position.
operation.selectDescription: Select the type of operation you want to do
operation.selectWalletDesc: Select the wallet to make the investment

operation.title: Add Operation
operation.details: Add a new operation, means that you can invest some FIAT money to Crypto by selecting New Investment, open a new Holding position by moving Crypto or Stablecoin or open a new Trading position, that means you can open and close position on those Crypto.

newInvestment.title: New Investment
newInvestment.details: In this section you can add a new investment, from your Personal Wallet into the selected Crypto Wallet, it will add a new operation and update or add the current Asset.

holding.title: Holding
holding.details:
In this section you can perform an Holding operation.
Choose the Asset you want to use for the investment from your wallet and the Asset you want to buy.
It will also calculate automatically the percentage of money invested moved to the new account.
You can always edit the Asset balance and invested into the Details page of the Asset, into the wallet list.

trading.title: Trading
trading.details: The Trading section of MoneyStats allows you to execute trading operations directly from your wallet. You can swap between Stablecoin and Cryptocurrency, using an intuitive and secure interface. Transactions are monitored in real-time, and for enhanced management, open operations can be reviewed and closed in the Resume section of the application.

closeOperation.title: Close Operation
closeOperation.details:
You are about to proceed with the closure of the current operation. This section allows you to confirm or modify the essential details of the operation before finalizing it.

Operation Details:
  • Exit Price: This represents the price at which you intend to sell the asset. Ensure it reflects your expectations and the current market conditions.
  • Quantity: This is the quantity of the asset you intend to sell. Ensure it matches the actual quantity held.

If you believe there are discrepancies in the above data or wish to make changes, click to update the operation details.

Once you are satisfied with the entered information, you can proceed with the closure of the operation. Remember to trade cautiously and make informed decisions.

transfer.title: Crypto Transfer
transfer.details: In this section, you can easily transfer your assets from one wallet to another. Choose your destination wallet, select the desired crypto asset, and set the quantity you wish to move. You also have the option to define any applicable fees to ensure a timely and secure transaction. Be sure to carefully review all details before confirming the transfer.
